name: Voltorb
flavorText: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a Monster Ball, it has zapped many people.

strengths: Evolves into Electrode, which has game-changing Buzzap ability
Tackle uses Colorless Energy, allowing flexible deck building
Low retreat cost of 1 provides good mobility
Lightning typing gives it advantage against Water Pokemon
weaknesses: Very low 40 HP makes it extremely fragile
Fighting weakness leaves it vulnerable to popular Fighting Pokemon
Only one attack with minimal 10 damage output
No resistance to help with defensive matchups
Limited utility as a standalone Pokemon
synergies: Evolve quickly into Electrode to access Buzzap energy acceleration
Use Electrode's Buzzap to power up other Lightning Pokemon like Zapdos
PlusPower can boost Tackle to 20 damage if needed
Defender can help Voltorb survive one extra turn to evolve
counters: Machop - Fighting weakness and higher HP make this impossible
Onix - Cannot deal meaningful damage and takes double damage
Sandshrew - Fighting type advantage and resistance make this very bad
